languages.text: "Ты такой искренний, Соломон! Приятно, что я могу верить каждому твоему слову!"
"You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"
languages.original_text: "Ты такой искренний, Соломон! Приятно, что я могу верить каждому твоему слову!"

traits.locale_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"
"You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"
"You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"
"You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"
"You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

languages.text: « Votre sincérité me touche, Solomorne ! C'est tellement rare de rencontrer quelqu'un que l'on peut croire sur parole ! »
languages.original_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre sincérité me touche, Solomorne ! C'est tellement rare de rencontrer quelqu'un que l'on peut croire sur parole ! »

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、君は本当に誠実なんだね。君の言うことを、全部信じられるなんて素敵だよ！」
languages.original_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、君は本当に誠実なんだね。君の言うことを、全部信じられるなんて素敵だよ！」

languages.text: «¡Es muy sincero, Solomorne! ¡Me alegro de poder creer todo lo que me dice!».
languages.original_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es muy sincero, Solomorne! ¡Me alegro de poder creer todo lo que me dice!».

languages.text: “你的措辞非常真诚，索罗蒙！能相信你说出的每个字，我真的很高兴！”
languages.original_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

traits.locale_text: “你的措辞非常真诚，索罗蒙！能相信你说出的每个字，我真的很高兴！”

languages.text: "Çok dürüstsün Solomorne! Asla yalan söylemeyeceğinden emin olmak ne güzel!"
languages.original_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

traits.locale_text: "Çok dürüstsün Solomorne! Asla yalan söylemeyeceğinden emin olmak ne güzel!"

languages.text: "Ihr seid so aufrichtig, Solomorne! Es ist schön, dass ich jedes Eurer Worte glauben kann!"
languages.original_text: "You're so sincere, Solomorne! It's nice that I can believe every word you say!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid so aufrichtig, Solomorne! Es ist schön, dass ich jedes Eurer Worte glauben kann!"
